Name: Hidden
About the game: The current version is the mobile game transplantation version, and the PC exclusive version is still in production. Please look forward to it! Game introduction: We welcome your challenge. 'HIdden' is a first person horror decryption game. The player will play the role of Wang xuanzuo and enter the school complex at night to help the teacher get the information. However, the gate was locked and the whole building was shrouded in cold air. How many hidden secrets are there in this building? Can you find the key and open the door to escape?
Meta Title: Hidden: Jul 13, 2020, Olsc and Full Overview
